CustomField.description: Indicates if the customer's last signed quote contained the auto-renewal clause and hence we can enforce auto-renewal.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the last signed contract/quote contained the AR clause, then set to YES and put a link to the document into the "Previous Quote with AR Cluse" field. If last signed quote did not have the AR clause or quote can't be located, then set to NO. Auto-Renewal is only possible if there is a previously signed contract/quote with an AR clause.
CustomField.label: Has Auto-Renewal Clause
